mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT oi.legal_name legalName, opc.customer_name supplierChName, ifnull( opb.already_paid_amount, 0 ) alreadyPaidAmount, ifnull( opb.bill_order_num, 0 ) billOrderNum, ifnull( opb.bill_num, 0 ) billNum, (select ifnull(sum(t1.change_amount),0) from order_payment_cost t1 where t1.is_bill = '0' AND t1.is_sum_to_main = '1' and t1.customer_name = opc.customer_name and t1.main_order_no in (select o1.order_no from order_info o1 where o1.legal_name = oi.legal_name)) notPaidAmount, (select count(DISTINCT t1.main_order_no) from order_payment_cost t1 where t1.is_bill = '0' AND t1.is_sum_to_main = '1' and t1.customer_name = opc.customer_name and t1.main_order_no in (select o1.order_no from order_info o1 where o1.legal_name = oi.legal_name)) notPaidOrderNum FROM order_payment_cost opc LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON oi.order_no = opc.main_order_no left join order_payment_bill opb on opb.legal_name = oi.legal_name and opb.supplier_ch_name = opc.customer_name and opb.is_main = 1 where 1 = 1
and oi.customer_name like concat('%',#{form.supplierChName},'%')
and oi.legal_name like concat('%',#{form.legalName},'%')

SELECT DISTINCT oi.legal_name legalName, opc.customer_name supplierChName, ifnull( opb.already_paid_amount, 0 ) alreadyPaidAmount, ifnull( opb.bill_order_num, 0 ) billOrderNum, ifnull( opb.bill_num, 0 ) billNum, (select ifnull(sum(t1.change_amount),0) from order_payment_cost t1 where t1.is_bill = '0' AND t1.is_sum_to_main = '0' and t1.customer_name = opc.customer_name and t1.main_order_no in (select o1.order_no from order_info o1 where o1.legal_name = oi.legal_name)) notPaidAmount, (select count(DISTINCT t1.main_order_no) from order_payment_cost t1 where t1.is_bill = '0' AND t1.is_sum_to_main = '0' and t1.customer_name = opc.customer_name and t1.main_order_no in (select o1.order_no from order_info o1 where o1.legal_name = oi.legal_name)) notPaidOrderNum FROM order_payment_cost opc LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON oi.order_no = opc.main_order_no left join order_payment_bill opb on opb.legal_name = oi.legal_name and opb.supplier_ch_name = opc.customer_name and opb.is_main = 0 and opb.sub_type = #{form.cmd} where 1 = 1
and oi.customer_name like concat('%',#{form.supplierChName},'%')
and oi.legal_name like concat('%',#{form.legalName},'%')
